attributes.action: Do not scrap trial by jury
attributes.additional_details: The right to a trial by one’s peers when accused of any serious offence is a cornerstone of the justice system which Britain has pioneered for centuries.  No backlog can justify its restriction.
attributes.background: Several reports indicate the Justice Secretary intends to restrict trial by jury to only rape, murder and manslaughter.  This is fundamentally incompatible with our justice system, would lead to more miscarriages of justice and should be roundly rejected.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not remove trial by jury for certain cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751480
